        <script><![CDATA[calcEffortAndAllocation();

function calcEffortAndAllocation() {
   var previousTotal = previous.total;
   var currentTotal = current.total;
   
   var oldEffort = current.task.work_effort.getGlideObject().getNumericValue();
   var newTotal = parseInt(currentTotal * 60 * 60 * 1000, 10);
   var newEffort = 0;
   if (oldEffort > 0 && current.total.changes() && 
        current.getValue("total") != previous.getValue("total")) {
        var prevTotal = parseInt(previous.total * 60 * 60 * 1000, 10);
        newEffort = parseInt(oldEffort - prevTotal + newTotal, 10);  
   } else {
      newEffort = parseInt(oldEffort + newTotal, 10);
   }
   if (gs.getProperty('com.snc.time_card.update.effort') == 'true') {
      var tsk = new GlideRecord('planned_task');
      if (tsk.isValid()) {
         
         tsk.addQuery('sys_id', current.task);
         tsk.query();
         if (tsk.next()) {
            tsk.work_effort.setDateNumericValue(newEffort);
            tsk.update();
         }
      }
   }
   
   if (gs.getProperty('com.snc.time_card.update.resource') == 'true') {
      if (((current.task.sys_class_name == 'pm_project') || ((current.task.sys_class_name == 'pm_project_task'))) && (!current.task.nil())) {
         var ur = new GlideRecord('user_resource');
         if (ur.isValid()) {
            
            ur.addQuery('planned_task', current.task.top_task.sys_id);
            ur.addQuery('user', current.user);
            ur.query();
            if (ur.next()) {
               ur.work_hours = parseFloat(ur.work_hours) - parseFloat(previousTotal) + parseFloat(currentTotal);
               ur.update();
            }
            else {
               //create a user resource
               ur.setValue('planned_task', current.task.top_task.sys_id);
               ur.setValue('user', current.user);
               ur.work_hours = parseFloat(ur.work_hours, 10) - parseFloat(previousTotal, 10) + parseFloat(currentTotal, 10);
               ur.insert();
            }
         }
      }
   }
}]]></script>
